akn:content.akn:p:
§ 53304. Vessel ownership In this chapter, a vessel is deemed to be constructed or acquired by a taxpayer if constructed or acquired by a corporation when the taxpayer owns at least 95 percent of each class of stock of the corporation. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 8(c), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1588.)
